main event: A round blue and white object was observed hovering stationary for 2-3 minutes near Radium Springs, NM, before disappearing into a cloud bank.
interesting points: The sighting took place at night,The object was described as the size of a dime at arm's length,The observation lasted for 2-3 minutes,Three separate law enforcement officers verified the sighting,The initial report suggested the object could be a balloon or aircraft.
sighted object: one round blue and white object
witness description: officers from the Las Cruces City Police Department, Dona Ana County Sheriff's Department, and New Mexico State Police
